page.title: 07SPORT
page.content: We have also looked at the type of sports 10 year old children take part in.The children attend Poulton-le-Sands C.E. School Morecambe. They all come from a middle to lower-middle class background. We are not including sport undertaken at school. 10 Children go to a swimming club. 7 Children go to a football club. 1 Child goes to a cricket club. 3 Children go to an athletics club. 1 Child goes to a golf club. 1 Child goes to a keep fit club. 2 Children go to a judo club. 1 Child goes to ballet classes.
